param.name: numberDuplicates
param.label: Number duplicate URLs
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour of this option.

param.name: autoCanonical
param.label: Automatic canonical link generation
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour of this option.

param.name: ignoreSource
param.label: Ignore multiple sources
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour of this option.

param.name: itemid
param.label: Itemid handling
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour with your own Itemid.

param.name: overrideId
param.label: Override Itemid
param.description: Itemid to always use with this component. Leave blank to use the default one.

param.name: useSitename
param.label: Use site name
param.description: If set to No, the site name will not be shown in page title for this extension.

param.name: customSitename
param.label: Custom site name
param.description: Here you can set custom site name to be used in page title for this extension. Leave blank for default.

param.name: pageLimit
param.label: Items per page
param.description: If you have problems with pagination, you can manually set number of items per page here.

param.name: handling
param.label: Handling
param.description:
JoomSEF handler
process normally through JoomSEF, if an SEF extension or router file is present it will be used
Default Joomla! router
do not store in DB and create standard Joomla SEF URLs
Don't SEF
do not make SEF urls for this component

param.name: showMenuTitle
param.label: Show Menu Title
param.description: If set to No, the menu title will not be present in SEF URL at all (except the direct link to component)

param.name: customMenuTitle
param.label: Custom Menu Title
param.description: Overrides the default menu title (first part of SEF URL) in SEF URL; leave blank for default behaviour

param.name: customNonSef
param.label: Custom non-SEF variables
param.description: Here you can specify custom non-SEF variables separated by semicolon.

param.name: acceptVars
param.label: Filter variables
param.description: Here you can specify variables known to be used by the component separated by semicolon. You can specify custom filters for these variables on the left side.

param.name: acceptStrict
param.label: Accept only filtered variables
param.description: If set to yes, only variables specified in Filter variables field will be accepted to SEF URL, others will be handled as non-SEF.

param.name: stopRule
param.label: Do not SEF URLs matching regular expression
param.description: Here you can specify which URLs not to SEF using regular expression. URLs matching this expression will not be SEFed at all.

param.name: varFilterFail
param.label: URLs that fail the variable filter test
param.description:
Specify what to do when the URL fails the variable filter test.
Don't SEF variable
Only the variable that failed the test will not be included in SEF URL.
Don't SEF URL
The entire URL will not be SEFed.
Don't process at all
URL won't be processed by Joomla! at all.

param.name: downloadId
param.label: Extension Download ID
param.description: You can set the Download ID of paid extensions here. It is needed for the automatic upgrade to work.
